attributes.action: I would like the invitation for Trump to visit the U.K. to be revoked.
attributes.additional_details: A visit by Donald’s Trump could be perceived as condoning his behaviour and sends out a suggestion that British people approve of him and the message he is giving. A vast amount of people do not approve. A tough stance should be taken against a world leader that advocates racial hatred. Britain is a multicultural country and should be seen to celebrate that. We should demonstrate to the world that racism will not be tolerated.
attributes.background: On Wednesday 29 November 2017, Donald Trump retweeted three tweets originating from Britain First “BF”. BF are known to have fascist/right wing ideology. The retweets were designed to incite racial hatred against members of the Muslim community. Allowing Trump to visit sends out the wrong message.
